DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics 7-day-repeated dos FYU-981 administer orally healthy male adult daily . Participants randomize placebo ( n=3 ) FYU-981 ( n=6 ) step . After follow-up examination step lower dose , next dose administer .
DOC.brief_title: Repeated Dose Phase I Study FYU-981
